recipeInstructions.text: firstly, prepare pudina chutney in a small blender take 1 cup mint and ½ cup coriander.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, prepare pudina chutney in a small blender take 1 cup mint and ½ cup coriander.

recipeInstructions.text: also add 2 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger and 2 chilli.
recipeInstructions.name: also add 2 clove garlic, 1 inch ginger and 2 chilli.

recipeInstructions.text: blend to smooth paste without adding any water.
recipeInstructions.name: blend to smooth paste without adding any water.

recipeInstructions.text: transfer the pudina chutney to a large bowl also add ½ cup curd.
recipeInstructions.name: transfer the pudina chutney to a large bowl also add ½ cup curd.

recipeInstructions.text: further add ½ tsp coriander powder, ½ tsp garam masala, ¼ tsp cumin powder and ½ tsp aamchur.
recipeInstructions.name: further add ½ tsp coriander powder, ½ tsp garam masala, ¼ tsp cumin powder and ½ tsp aamchur.

recipeInstructions.text: also add 1 tsp kasuri methi, 1 tsp lemon juice, ¼ tsp, 2 tbsp oil and ½ tsp salt.
recipeInstructions.name: also add 1 tsp kasuri methi, 1 tsp lemon juice, ¼ tsp, 2 tbsp oil and ½ tsp salt.

recipeInstructions.text: whisk and mix well making sure all the ingredients are well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: whisk and mix well making sure all the ingredients are well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: further, add 9 cubes paneer, 9 cubes capsicum and ½ onion.
recipeInstructions.name: further, add 9 cubes paneer, 9 cubes capsicum and ½ onion.

recipeInstructions.text: mix gently without breaking anything.
recipeInstructions.name: mix gently without breaking anything.

recipeInstructions.text: cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours to marinate well.
recipeInstructions.name: cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours to marinate well.

recipeInstructions.text: after 2 hours mix gently.
recipeInstructions.name: after 2 hours mix gently.

recipeInstructions.text: now take a skewer and pierce in capsicum, paneer and onion alternatively.
recipeInstructions.name: now take a skewer and pierce in capsicum, paneer and onion alternatively.

recipeInstructions.text: roast on tawa adding oil as required.
recipeInstructions.name: roast on tawa adding oil as required.

recipeInstructions.text: turn around and roast until it turns golden brown. you can also bake in oven or tandoor.
recipeInstructions.name: turn around and roast until it turns golden brown. you can also bake in oven or tandoor.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, sprinkle chaat masala and enjoy pudina paneer tikka recipe with green chutney.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, sprinkle chaat masala and enjoy pudina paneer tikka recipe with green chutney.

recipeInstructions.text: firstly in a large bowl take 2 cup puttu flour and ¼ tsp salt. mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly in a large bowl take 2 cup puttu flour and ¼ tsp salt. mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: now add ¼ cup water and crumble the flour.
recipeInstructions.name: now add ¼ cup water and crumble the flour.

recipeInstructions.text: add water in batches and mix well with your fingertips.
recipeInstructions.name: add water in batches and mix well with your fingertips.

recipeInstructions.text: the flour need to hold shape when pressed between the fist, and need to break on further pressing.
recipeInstructions.name: the flour need to hold shape when pressed between the fist, and need to break on further pressing.

recipeInstructions.text: make a moist flour with crumbly texture.
recipeInstructions.name: make a moist flour with crumbly texture.

recipeInstructions.text: break all the lumps with your finger. alternatively, blend it in a mixer for 2 pulses.
recipeInstructions.name: break all the lumps with your finger. alternatively, blend it in a mixer for 2 pulses.

recipeInstructions.text: now take a puttu steamer and layer with 2 tbsp of fresh grated coconut.
recipeInstructions.name: now take a puttu steamer and layer with 2 tbsp of fresh grated coconut.

recipeInstructions.text: followed by 3 tbsp of puttu flour. again layer with 2 tbsp of coconut, 3 tbsp of 3 tbsp of puttu flour.
recipeInstructions.name: followed by 3 tbsp of puttu flour. again layer with 2 tbsp of coconut, 3 tbsp of 3 tbsp of puttu flour.

recipeInstructions.text: lastly add 2 tbsp coconut and level it up.
recipeInstructions.name: lastly add 2 tbsp coconut and level it up.

recipeInstructions.text: close the puttu kutty (cylindrical tube) and steam for 5 minutes or till the steam escapes from top holes of puttu kutty (cylindrical tube).
recipeInstructions.name: close the puttu kutty (cylindrical tube) and steam for 5 minutes or till the steam escapes from top holes of puttu kutty (cylindrical tube).

recipeInstructions.text: carefully open it and push the puttu using a wooden ladle from the back.
recipeInstructions.name: carefully open it and push the puttu using a wooden ladle from the back.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve kerala puttu hot along with kadala curry.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve kerala puttu hot along with kadala curry.

@graph.description: easy green chutney recipe | hari chutney | green chutney for chaat
recipeIngredient: ½ tsp cumin powder / jeera powder

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a blender take 1 cup coriander leaves and ½ cup mint leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a blender take 1 cup coriander leaves and ½ cup mint leaves.

recipeInstructions.text: also add 3 clove garlic, 3 inch ginger and 3 green chilli.
recipeInstructions.name: also add 3 clove garlic, 3 inch ginger and 3 green chilli.

recipeInstructions.text: additionally add 2 tbsp roasted gram dal, ½ tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp chaat masala, ½ tsp sugar, ½ tsp salt and pinch of hing.
recipeInstructions.name: additionally add 2 tbsp roasted gram dal, ½ tsp cumin powder, 1 tsp chaat masala, ½ tsp sugar, ½ tsp salt and pinch of hing.

recipeInstructions.text: blend smooth adding ½ cup water.
recipeInstructions.name: blend smooth adding ½ cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: transfer to a cup and mix 1 tbsp lemon juice.
recipeInstructions.name: transfer to a cup and mix 1 tbsp lemon juice.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, green chutney for chaat is ready to use for sandwich or chaats.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, green chutney for chaat is ready to use for sandwich or chaats.

recipeInstructions.text: Firstly, in a pan take 1 tsp ghee and roast 1 cup rava till it turns aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: Firstly, in a pan take 1 tsp ghee and roast 1 cup rava till it turns aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: Add ½ tsp salt and 1 cup hot water.
recipeInstructions.name: Add ½ tsp salt and 1 cup hot water.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well making sure everything is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well making sure everything is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until the rava is cooked well.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and simmer for 10 minutes or until the rava is cooked well.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer the mixture to the large plate, add 2 tbsp curd and mix well.

recipeIngredient: ½ tsp aamchur / dry mango powder

recipeInstructions.name: dough preparation:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a large bowl take 1 cup maida and 2 tbsp besan.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a large bowl take 1 cup maida and 2 tbsp besan.

itemListElement.text: add ¼ tsp turmeric, pinch hing and ½ tsp salt. mix well.
itemListElement.name: add ¼ tsp turmeric, pinch hing and ½ tsp salt. mix well.

itemListElement.text: now pour 2 tbsp hot oil and mix well.
itemListElement.name: now pour 2 tbsp hot oil and mix well.

itemListElement.text: crumble and mix well making sure the flour is moist and holds shape when pressed between fist.
itemListElement.name: crumble and mix well making sure the flour is moist and holds shape when pressed between fist.

itemListElement.text: add water as required and knead to a smooth and tight dough.
itemListElement.name: add water as required and knead to a smooth and tight dough.

itemListElement.text: grease the dough with a tsp of oil. cover and rest for 20 minutes.
itemListElement.name: grease the dough with a tsp of oil. cover and rest for 20 minutes.

recipeInstructions.name: masala stuffing preparation:

itemListElement.text: firstly, in a small blender take ¼ cup dry coconut. you can also use desiccated coconut.
itemListElement.name: firstly, in a small blender take ¼ cup dry coconut. you can also use desiccated coconut.

itemListElement.text: add 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander seeds, 1 tsp fennel, 2 tsp sesame and 1 tsp poppy seeds.
itemListElement.name: add 1 tsp cumin, 1 tsp coriander seeds, 1 tsp fennel, 2 tsp sesame and 1 tsp poppy seeds.

itemListElement.text: further add ¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, pinch hing, ½ tsp aamchur, 2 tsp sugar and ½ tsp salt.
itemListElement.name: further add ¼ tsp turmeric, 1 tsp chilli powder, pinch hing, ½ tsp aamchur, 2 tsp sugar and ½ tsp salt.

itemListElement.text: blend to slightly coarse powder without adding any water. keep aside.
itemListElement.name: blend to slightly coarse powder without adding any water. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.name: preparing bhakarwadi:

itemListElement.text: firstly, knead the dough slightly and pinch a large ball of dough. flatten them as you do with chapati ball.
itemListElement.name: firstly, knead the dough slightly and pinch a large ball of dough. flatten them as you do with chapati ball.

itemListElement.text: now grease the rolling base and rolling pin with oil.
itemListElement.name: now grease the rolling base and rolling pin with oil.

itemListElement.text: roll them into round / square shape making slightly thick than chapati.
itemListElement.name: roll them into round / square shape making slightly thick than chapati.

itemListElement.text: further spread a tsp of tamarind chutney leaving the sides.
itemListElement.name: further spread a tsp of tamarind chutney leaving the sides.

itemListElement.text: spread the prepared masala stuffing leaving the sides.
itemListElement.name: spread the prepared masala stuffing leaving the sides.

itemListElement.text: now grease water on sides to seal the ends while rolling.
itemListElement.name: now grease water on sides to seal the ends while rolling.

itemListElement.text: slowly roll the dough very tightly, making sure there are no gaps. else while deep frying, bhakarwadi will fall apart.
itemListElement.name: slowly roll the dough very tightly, making sure there are no gaps. else while deep frying, bhakarwadi will fall apart.

itemListElement.text: further, cut the roll to 2 cm long or as desired.
itemListElement.name: further, cut the roll to 2 cm long or as desired.

itemListElement.text: press and flatten slightly. this helps layers and masala to be intact.
itemListElement.name: press and flatten slightly. this helps layers and masala to be intact.

itemListElement.text: heat the oil on medium heat, and deep fry the rolls on low flame.
itemListElement.name: heat the oil on medium heat, and deep fry the rolls on low flame.

itemListElement.text: stir occasionally till they turn golden brown and crisp.
itemListElement.name: stir occasionally till they turn golden brown and crisp.

itemListElement.text: drain the bhakarwadi on kitchen towel to remove excess oil.
itemListElement.name: drain the bhakarwadi on kitchen towel to remove excess oil.

itemListElement.text: finally, serve bhakarwadi with masala tea or store in an airtight container once cooled completely for a month.
itemListElement.name: finally, serve bhakarwadi with masala tea or store in an airtight container once cooled completely for a month.

recipeInstructions.text: नूडल्स को बिना मैश करके अच्छी तरह मिलाएं। नूडल्स मैश करेंगे तो खाने के दौरान यह दिखाई नहीं देंगे।
recipeInstructions.name: नूडल्स को बिना मैश करके अच्छी तरह मिलाएं। नूडल्स मैश करेंगे तो खाने के दौरान यह दिखाई नहीं देंगे।

recipeInstructions.text: अब 2 टेबलस्पून मैदा, 2 टेबलस्पून मकई का आटा, ¼ टीस्पून क्रश किया हुआ काली मिर्च, स्वादअनुसार नमक और ½ कप पानी डाल के मैदा पेस्ट तैयार करें।
recipeInstructions.name: अब 2 टेबलस्पून मैदा, 2 टेबलस्पून मकई का आटा, ¼ टीस्पून क्रश किया हुआ काली मिर्च, स्वादअनुसार नमक और ½ कप पानी डाल के मैदा पेस्ट तैयार करें।

recipeInstructions.text: लंप मुक्त बहती स्थिरता बैटर बनाने के लिए अच्छी तरह मिलाएं।
recipeInstructions.name: लंप मुक्त बहती स्थिरता बैटर बनाने के लिए अच्छी तरह मिलाएं।

recipeInstructions.text: तेल के साथ हाथ को ग्रीस करें और एक छोटी बॉल आकार की पैटीज़ तैयार करें। ग्रीस करने से आटे को हाथ में चिपकने से रोकता है।
recipeInstructions.name: तेल के साथ हाथ को ग्रीस करें और एक छोटी बॉल आकार की पैटीज़ तैयार करें। ग्रीस करने से आटे को हाथ में चिपकने से रोकता है।

recipeInstructions.text: अब तैयार किया मैदा पेस्ट में डिप करें और सभी तरफ बैटर से कवर करें।
recipeInstructions.name: अब तैयार किया मैदा पेस्ट में डिप करें और सभी तरफ बैटर से कवर करें।

recipeInstructions.text: ब्रेड क्रम्ब्स के साथ सभी साइड्स को कोट करें। पैंको ब्रेड क्रम्ब्स / क्रश किया कॉर्न फ्लेक्स का उपयोग करें क्योंकि वे अच्छी बनावट देते हैं।
recipeInstructions.name: ब्रेड क्रम्ब्स के साथ सभी साइड्स को कोट करें। पैंको ब्रेड क्रम्ब्स / क्रश किया कॉर्न फ्लेक्स का उपयोग करें क्योंकि वे अच्छी बनावट देते हैं।

recipeInstructions.text: अब गर्म तेल में फ्राई करें या पैन फ्राई करें। वैकल्पिक रूप से, 12 मिनट के लिए 180 डिग्री सेल्सियस पर प्रीहीटेड ओवन में बेक करें।
recipeInstructions.name: अब गर्म तेल में फ्राई करें या पैन फ्राई करें। वैकल्पिक रूप से, 12 मिनट के लिए 180 डिग्री सेल्सियस पर प्रीहीटेड ओवन में बेक करें।

recipeInstructions.text: मध्यम फ्लेम पर तलें, यह सुनहरा भूरा होने तक कभी-कभी हिलाएं।
recipeInstructions.name: मध्यम फ्लेम पर तलें, यह सुनहरा भूरा होने तक कभी-कभी हिलाएं।

recipeInstructions.text: अंत में, मैगी मसाला नूडल्स कटलेट को मिंट डिप या टमाटर सॉस के साथ आनंद लें।

@graph.description: easy karadantu recipe | gokak kardantu sweet recipe | dry fruit barfi
recipeIngredient: ¼ cup (50 gram) gond / edible gum
¼ tsp nutmeg powder / jaiphal powder

recipeInstructions.text: firstly, in a pan heat ¼ cup ghee and roast ¼ cup gond.
recipeInstructions.name: firstly, in a pan heat ¼ cup ghee and roast ¼ cup gond.

recipeInstructions.text: roast on low flame until gond puffs up and turns slightly golden. keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: roast on low flame until gond puffs up and turns slightly golden. keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: in a leftover ghee add ¼ cup badam, ¼ cup cashew, 2 tbsp pistachios, ¼ cup figs, 2 tbsp raisins and 2 tbsp pumpkin seeds.
recipeInstructions.name: in a leftover ghee add ¼ cup badam, ¼ cup cashew, 2 tbsp pistachios, ¼ cup figs, 2 tbsp raisins and 2 tbsp pumpkin seeds.

recipeInstructions.text: roast on low flame until the nuts turn crisp and golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: roast on low flame until the nuts turn crisp and golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: transfer to the same bowl and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: transfer to the same bowl and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: now dry roast 1 cup dry coconut on low flame until it turns aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: now dry roast 1 cup dry coconut on low flame until it turns aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: once it turn slightly brown, keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: once it turn slightly brown, keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: also roast 2 tbsp poppy seeds until it starts to pop.
recipeInstructions.name: also roast 2 tbsp poppy seeds until it starts to pop.

recipeInstructions.text: transfer to the same bowl and mix well making sure everything is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: transfer to the same bowl and mix well making sure everything is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: in a large kadai heat 2 tsp ghee and roast 5 dry dates until it turns aromatic.
recipeInstructions.name: in a large kadai heat 2 tsp ghee and roast 5 dry dates until it turns aromatic.

recipeInstructions.text: add 1 cup jaggery and ¼ cup water.
recipeInstructions.name: add 1 cup jaggery and ¼ cup water.

recipeInstructions.text: stir a dissolve jaggery well.
recipeInstructions.name: stir a dissolve jaggery well.

recipeInstructions.text: continue to boil until the jaggery syrup turns frothy. you can also drop and check in water to form a soft ball consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: continue to boil until the jaggery syrup turns frothy. you can also drop and check in water to form a soft ball consistency.

recipeInstructions.text: add in dry fruit mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: add in dry fruit mixture.

recipeInstructions.text: also add ¼ tsp nutmeg powder and ½ tsp cardamom powder.
recipeInstructions.name: also add ¼ tsp nutmeg powder and ½ tsp cardamom powder.

recipeInstructions.text: mix well making sure everything is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: mix well making sure everything is well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: transfer the prepared mixture into a greased mould lined with baking paper (size: 6 inch x 3 inch). set well forming a block.
recipeInstructions.name: transfer the prepared mixture into a greased mould lined with baking paper (size: 6 inch x 3 inch). set well forming a block.

recipeInstructions.text: allow setting for 30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: allow setting for 30 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: now unmould and cut into pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: now unmould and cut into pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: finally, serve karadantu or store in an airtight container for a month in the refrigerator.
recipeInstructions.name: finally, serve karadantu or store in an airtight container for a month in the refrigerator.
